body: Culture splenocytes from OT-1 mice at 37 °C in a 95% air/5%CO<sub>2</sub> saturated with H<sub>2</sub>0 with SIINFEKL peptide \(10 μg/ml) in the presence of MDSC \(at 3:1 ratio) on a poly-d-lysine coated glass bottom culture dish for  5h, 24h or 48h in complete media.

Label the cells with 6 μl of antibodies against Gr-1 \(conjugated with PE), CD8 \(conjugated with Alexa 647), Nitrotyrosine \(conjugated with Alexa 488), or isotype IgG conjugated with Alexa 488 and incubated on ice for 40-60 min.
Wash the cells with PBS + 2% FBS twice, complete media is added and the dishes are kept on ice.

View the cells with a DMI6000 inverted Leica TCS AOBS SP5 tandem scanning confocal microscope with a 40x /1.30NA oil immersion objective. Tunable 488 Argon and 546 and 633 laser lines were applied to excite the samples using AOBS line switching to minimize crosstalk between fluorochromes.  Images and Z-stacks are produced with three cooled photomultiplier detectors and the LAS AF version 1.5.1.889 software suite.
